title: "PinholeProjection"

<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

Camera projection, from image coordinates to view coordinates.

Child from parent.
Image coordinates from camera view coordinates.

Example:
```text
1496.1     0.0  980.5
   0.0  1496.1  744.5
   0.0     0.0    1.0
```

## Rerun datatype
[`Mat3x3`](../datatypes/mat3x3.md)


## Arrow datatype
```
FixedSizeList<9, float32>
```
